result.name: organisational-performance-dataset
result.notes: Data relating to the performance of the IPO as measured against its Ministerial Targets.
result.title: Organisational Performance dataset

extras.value: IPO sets out its Ministerial Targets for the coming year in its Corporate Plan. Performance against the targets is published at the end of year in IPO's Annual Report and Accounts.  IPO web pages:  http://www.ipo.gov.uk/about/whatwedo/ourperform/ourperform-target.htm and http://www.ipo.gov.uk/about/whatwedo/ourpublications/ourpublications-review.htm.  This information is not currently published on IPO's external website.  IPO will look into doing this in the future and also publish on data.gov.uk .  Actual performance against Ministerial Targets is not currently published on ipo.gov.uk or data.gov.uk.  IPO will look into publicising this dataset on ipo.gov.uk and also on data.gov.uk
